name: msaprobs
publications: Yongchao Liu, Bertil Schmidt and Douglas L. Maskell MSAProbs: multiple sequence alignment based on pair hidden Markov models and partition function posterior probabilities. Bioinformatics (2010) 26 (16): 1958-1964.
description: MSAPROBS is a new and practial protein multiple sequence alignment algorithm based on pair hidden markov model and partition function posterrior probabilities.
